alert.note: Alert for Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 30 at 6:41PM CDT until March 30 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 78 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 15 PARISHES IN SOUTHEAST LOUISIANA ASCENSION ASSUMPTION JEFFERSON LAFOURCHE LIVINGSTON ORLEANS PLAQUEMINES ST. BERNARD ST. CHARLES ST. JAMES ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST ST. TAMMANY TANGIPAHOA TERREBONNE WASHINGTON IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHERN MISSISSIPPI WALTHALL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMITE, BAYOU CANE, BELLE CHASSE, BOGALUSA, BURAS, CHALMETTE, CONVENT, COVINGTON, CUT OFF, DENHAM SPRINGS, DESTREHAN, DEXTER, DONALDSONVILLE, EAST NEW ORLEANS, ENON, FRANKLINTON, GALLIANO, GONZALES, GRAMERCY, HAMMOND, HOUMA, KENNER, LABADIEVILLE, LACOMBE, LAPLACE, LAROSE, LUTCHER, MANDEVILLE, METAIRIE, NEW ORLEANS, NORCO, PAINCOURTVILLE, PIERRE PART, POINTE A LA HACHE, PONCHATOULA, PORT SULPHUR, PRAIRIEVILLE, RACELAND, RESERVE, ROBERT, SALEM, SLIDELL, THIBODAUX, TYLERTOWN, VIOLET, WALKER, AND WATSON.
